mapper.select: SELECT g.grade_no , g.exam_no , g.user_no , g.original_score , g.percentile_score , g.kor , g.math , g.eng , g.kor_took , g.math_took , g.eng_took , u.user_name , e.exam_name , e.exam_context , TO_CHAR(e.exam_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS exam_date FROM grade g INNER JOIN user_account u ON g.user_no = u.user_no INNER JOIN exam e ON g.exam_no = e.exam_no WHERE g.user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY g.grade_no ASC

SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(exam_date, 'YYYY') AS exam_year FROM exam e INNER JOIN grade g ON e.exam_no = g.grade_no INNER JOIN user_account ua ON g.user_no = ua.user_no WHERE g.user_no = #{userNo} AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM exam_date) = #{year} ORDER BY exam_year DESC
